## EffectFactory type

The effect factory function type. Accepts either a plain function or a FlushStrategy for deferred execution.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type EffectFactory = (run: EffectRun) => () => void;
```
**References:** [EffectRun](../effectrun/)
